snippet: Two college students who wrote for our student-led series "The Envelope, Please" are answering questions about going to college. Part 5.
abstract: Two college students who wrote for our student-led series "The Envelope, Please" are answering questions about going to college. Part 5.

byline.original: By HANNAH STEINHARDT and TANYA ABRAMS

headline.main: Part 5: College Students Answer Reader Questions on Admissions and Campus Life
